message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,000,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with your decision.

Alice, thanks for the offer, but $1,000,000 is still a bit out of my range. Given my budget, I can only offer $850,000 for the product.  It's a fair price for both of us, and hopefully, we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $850,000 is your maximum budget, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. Considering its value to you, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $900,000. This is a compromise that I believe is fair for both of us. I'm confident you'll see the value in this product and be willing to meet me halfway.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $900,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm firm on my offer of $850,000.  This is a fair price considering my budget, and I believe it's a good deal for you as well. Let's meet in the middle and close this deal.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $850,000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer it to you for $875,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to you. I hope you can see the value in this compromise and be willing to meet me at this price.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $875,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm prepared to offer $850,000 for the product, which is my final offer. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product for both of us, and I'm confident you'll agree.

Bob, I understand that you're firm on your offer, but I'm not willing to accept $850,000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $880,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to you. I hope you can see the value in this compromise and be willing to meet me at this price.
